docs.snippet: Uzbekistan will bank on home advantage to advance past Jordan in the return leg of their World Cup Asia zone playoff in Tashkent on Tuesday as both teams vie to keep alive their hopes of making a maiden appearance in the finals in Brazil next year.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uzbekistan will bank on home advantage to advance past Jordan in the return leg of their World Cup Asia zone playoff in Tashkent on Tuesday as both teams vie to keep alive their hopes of making a maiden appearance in the finals in Brazil next year.

headline.main: Uzbekistan Bank on Home Support Against Jordan in Playoff
headline.print_headline: Uzbekistan Bank on Home Support Against Jordan in Playoff

docs.snippet: Goalkeeper Sergio Romero returns to the scene of his international debut looking to equal a record run of 26 matches unbeaten as Argentina visit Paraguay determined to book their World Cup ticket on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Goalkeeper Sergio Romero returns to the scene of his international debut looking to equal a record run of 26 matches unbeaten as Argentina visit Paraguay determined to book their World Cup ticket on Tuesday.

headline.main: Argentina, Colombia Close In on World Cup Berths
headline.print_headline: Argentina, Colombia Close In on World Cup Berths

docs.snippet: Napa and Sonoma have their wine tours, and travelers flock to Scotland to sample the fine single malt whiskies. But in Jamaica, farmers are offering a different kind of trip for a different type of connoisseur.
docs.lead_paragraph: Napa and Sonoma have their wine tours, and travelers flock to Scotland to sample the fine single malt whiskies. But in Jamaica, farmers are offering a different kind of trip for a different type of connoisseur.

headline.main: In Jamaica, a Twist on Wine Tours for Pot Lovers
headline.print_headline: In Jamaica, a Twist on Wine Tours for Pot Lovers

docs.snippet: A story of remarkable human endurance in the snow-covered Andes has taken a somber turn.
docs.lead_paragraph: A story of remarkable human endurance in the snow-covered Andes has taken a somber turn.

headline.main: Man Flees Sex Charge, Survives 4 Months in Andes
headline.print_headline: Man Flees Sex Charge, Survives 4 Months in Andes

docs.snippet: Injured midfielder Macnelly Torres pulled out of Colombia's squad in Montevideo on Monday as they prepared for a World Cup qualifier against Uruguay in which they could book their ticket to the finals.
docs.lead_paragraph: Injured midfielder Macnelly Torres pulled out of Colombia's squad in Montevideo on Monday as they prepared for a World Cup qualifier against Uruguay in which they could book their ticket to the finals.

headline.main: Colombia's Torres Pulls Out of Key Qualifier in Uruguay
headline.print_headline: Colombia's Torres Pulls Out of Key Qualifier in Uruguay

docs.snippet: Barcelona forward Lionel Messi and his father will appear in court to answer charges of tax evasion on September 27 after a hearing scheduled for next week was postponed, a court statement said on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona forward Lionel Messi and his father will appear in court to answer charges of tax evasion on September 27 after a hearing scheduled for next week was postponed, a court statement said on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: Jordan won a dramatic penalty shootout against Uzbekistan in their Asia zone playoff on Tuesday to inch closer to a maiden World Cup finals appearance in Brazil next year.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jordan won a dramatic penalty shootout against Uzbekistan in their Asia zone playoff on Tuesday to inch closer to a maiden World Cup finals appearance in Brazil next year.

headline.main: Jordan Win Shootout to Close In on World Cup Spot
headline.print_headline: Jordan Win Shootout to Close In on World Cup Spot

docs.snippet: Late goals from Edinson Cavani and Cristian Stuani gave Uruguay a 2-0 home win over Colombia that all but sealed at least a playoff berth in the South American World Cup qualifiers on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Late goals from Edinson Cavani and Cristian Stuani gave Uruguay a 2-0 home win over Colombia that all but sealed at least a playoff berth in the South American World Cup qualifiers on Tuesday.

headline.main: Uruguay Beat Colombia 2-0 to Edge Closer to World Cup
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Beat Colombia 2-0 to Edge Closer to World Cup

docs.snippet: Venezuela kept alive their slim hopes of reaching the World Cup finals for the first time when they beat Peru 3-1 in Puerto La Cruz in their South American qualifier on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Venezuela kept alive their slim hopes of reaching the World Cup finals for the first time when they beat Peru 3-1 in Puerto La Cruz in their South American qualifier on Tuesday.

headline.main: Venezuela Beat Peru 3-2 to Keep World Cup Hopes Alive
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Beat Peru 3-2 to Keep World Cup Hopes Alive
